favourite.article:
Just focusing on the theme of Attraction, Beauty and Comeliness of the Lord and found this gem. What attracted Him to US - unbounded love and us to Him? We have it here.
Thank you and God bless.

This dear brother loved Christ! I want to echo br. Higashi, "Lord You're, irresistible, wonderful, indescribable, enjoyable, majestic, fantastic, the loveliest, the finest, the highest, the very best, the most excellent, just magnificent, You're the ultimate, You're infinite, So complete, So refreshing, my everything!" O Lord!
